thread.title: Good price (for NY) and excellent location.
thread.title_full: Good price (for NY) and excellent location. - Review of The Blakely New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: EttyBetty
title: Good price (for NY) and excellent location.
text:
Positives: Location is great - near MOMA, Fifth Avenue, Central Park, etc. Staff are also great. Rooms are spacious (at least mine was) and the bathrooms are lovely.
Negative: breakfast is very unhealthy and the decor of the rooms is somehow dated.
All in all a good experience and I'd consider staying there again when in NY.
